entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 8. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Flurries. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning. A few flurries beginning in the morning. Local amount 2 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 3. Wind chill near minus 15. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: Flurries ending near midnight then partly cloudy. Local amount 2 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 10 in the evening and minus 38 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023
